overview: Without notice, Clara quits her position as The Cup's manager. This causes Jamie, an employee, and Bea Reasonable, The Cup's drag queen owner, to search for her replacement. Bea soon discovers over a series of interviews that The Cup's regulars aren't exactly manager material. When all hope appears to be lost, Josh enters the shop to apply for the position. The interview goes incredibly well, and Bea believes she's found her replacement for Clara... but in a day where nothing has gone Bea's way, can it really be that simple?
title: The Replacement
